sys_hub_flow.description: Steps to approve and fulfill NeedIt requests.
sys_hub_flow.name: Need It Fullfillment (Magnum 2)

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Set State to Awaiting Approval and assign to Beth Anglin

sys_variable_value.value:
Configuring the Ask for Approvals Action

Flow Designer can create approvals for any record in ServiceNow. Use the Ask For Approvals action to request approvals. The Ask for Approvals action requires:

  • The Record to approve
  • The rules to approve and reject
  • The due date for approval (optional)

Configuring the Ask for Approvals Action

Flow Designer can create approvals for any record in ServiceNow. Use the Ask For Approvals action to request approvals. The Ask for Approvals action requires:

  • The Record to approve
  • The rules to approve and reject
  • The due date for approval (optional)
